name: Aakash Mahajan
subject: New Heading
message: Charles Bukowski is undoubtedly one of the best writers. His poems provide a reality check, strength, and guidance to pursue what you truly want in life. One of his poems, which is my favorite, has had a profound impact on me, and I would like to share it with you.
